name: Question_3
description: Participants are provided with a base64 encoded riddle and a link for a pdf. link for pdf: https://drive.google.com/file/d/13PcuOTcCeG33HxbrRdCOllXrgt5RC0Yc/view?usp=sharing. The pdf contains two random yt links and the hint to the question in white text. Answer is 'candle', input in the form of text.

questions.title: Solve the riddle
